title: Raise Vibration
lyrics:
Hold your hands up
Hold your head up
To the painted sky
Breathe in spirit
You can feel it
Let your ego die

Be a vessel

Never settle

For the [?]

Love will lead us

And complete us

This is what I know



We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration

We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration



Just like Jesus

As he teach us

Do it like the Lord

Just how Martin

Got it startin'

And without a sword

Just as Gandhi

Went to war

And never used a gun

We can join together

And through love we'll get it done



We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration

We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration



We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration

We've got to raise vibration

Wake up and raise vibration



Raise

Raise vibration

Raise

Raise vibration

We've got to raise, oh yeah

Raise vibration

Raise, oh raise

Raise vibration

We've got to raise, oh raise

Raise vibration
